FuncDef: The display device fan command displays fan information, such as whether a fan is installed, the fan status (normal or faulty), the fan speed, and the fan mode (automatic or manual). The display device fan command displays fan information, such as whether a fan is installed, the fan status (normal or faulty), the fan speed, and the fan mode (automatic or manual).
Examples: 1       FAN1       [ 1 ]       YES          YES           Normal      43%(10700)   Auto      Front-to-Back
FAN2       [ 1 ]       YES          YES           Normal      42%(10500)   Auto      Front-to-Back
FAN3       [ 1 ]       YES          YES           Normal      43%(10600)   Auto      Front-to-Back
FAN4       [ 1 ]       YES          YES           Normal      42%(10500)   Auto      Front-to-Back
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to check fan information, such as whether each fan is in position, fan status (normal or faulty), fan speed, and fan mode (automatic or manual).
